name: GeniusTablet
overview:
KYE Systems Corp. is an international consumer electronics concern established in 1983 in Taiwan. The company specializes in manufacturing pointing devices, digital imaging and gaming products for computers as well as accessories and components for mobile phones. KYE Systemsâ€™ operations cover the USA, Latin America, UK, Germany, and HK. Year after year KYE is reaching consumers with many new innovative products.

Genius is a branch division of KYE Systems Corp. Genius provides an extensive range of digital tablets. Genius tablet products successfully combine strong graphic features and advanced functionalities with budget pricing. Genius features three lines of their tablets: Fun Series, Style Series, and Power Series Products. Beginners and advanced users, hobbyists and professionals, creative artists and architects will find a pen tablet suitable for their specific needs and skill levels.

In September 2009 Genius Tablet launched a new Internet destination designed for quickly growing graphic tablet community. It is not only an exhaustive resource on Genius graphic tablets but also a place where digital art fans can share their artworks, creative ideas, tips, tricks and knowledge.
